MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L9 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Ormskirk Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.09AM. Our engineers are on site making repairs to a fault on our underground cable network.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.11PM on 21st January 2021.
